description: Simply doesn't work for midi playback for proton games - tested with multiple soundfonts, settings, games

My usage: Midi sounds not playing on steam deck so I use this program.
Beware warning: 0.19.3 version, the minimize upon startup on steam deck causes it to boot up and close out. You will have to delete and clear user information in order to get the program working again.

Midi sounds: Scc1t2.sf2

This enables me to play audio from the midi files I create in Frescobaldi on my Steam Deck Oled. After you get it set up with an .sf2 file, simply open the software, open Frescobaldi and start playing midi files. Works great, thanks! Peace
Wie deinstalliere ich das hier wieder?

Installée pour tester, je n'ai pas réussi à en faire sortir le moindre son, et quand j'essaie de la désinstaller en suivant la procédure habituelle, rien ne se passe. De plus, tous les fichiers sont verrouilés, ne permettant pas un effacement manuel simple.
